name: SteelPunk(TBC)
description:
This is the current build of my MetroidVania type game, SteelPunk (name tbc)
Right now, you can run, jump, dbl jump and attack.
None of that is animated yet haha

Also, you can't die yet so if you fall, you will fall forever.

The double jump takes directional input

WASD - move
Space - jump
Left Control/LMB - Attack
